  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.uima.collection.base_cpm.BaseCollectionReader, org.apache.uima.collection.CollectionReader, org.apache.uima.resource.ConfigurableResource, org.apache.uima.resource.Resource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WikipediaRevisionPairReader, WikipediaRevisionReader

    public abstract class WikipediaRevisionReaderBase
extends WikipediaReaderBase
    Abstract base class for all readers based on revisions.
